Text: Hey thanks a lot for this :) Hey Danny. Needed a help from you.  I want to master my rhythm playing. Strictly only rhythm. Can you kindly recommend any DVD's/e-books? Thanks for ur help :) With some links will be much appreciated :)

to balaguitar

sorry, I'm not a tutor but obviously needed rhythm skills depend on music genre you play.
there's for instance metal rhythm in 6 weeks etc etc.

btw what country are you from? point is I speak French better than English.

to balaguitar

a little ad:
there's a hugely helpful dvd from John McLaughlin and Selva Vinayakram called 'Konokol - The Gateway to Rhythm' with traditional Indian approach to learning rhythm patterns, especially the odd ones. An absolute musthave!
I'll try to upload it tomorrow. So - coming soon.
